full_summary:
### USB Video Class FHD Webcam for Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada

#### Solicitation Details

- **Solicitation Number**: BPM022615/28408
- **Publication Date**: November 20, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 5, 2024, 14:00:00

#### Requirement Description

Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada requires 1550 units of USB Video Class FHD Webcams (Lenovo 4XC1D66055 or equivalent). The webcams are to be delivered to Ottawa, ON, within 30 federal government working days from contract award.

#### Delivery and Security Requirements

- **Delivery Destination**: Ottawa, ON
- **Delivery Date**: 30 federal government working days from contract award
- **Security Requirements**: N/A
- **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements**: N/A

#### Procurement Details

- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information

- **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 1E3
- **Procurement Officer**: Emily Meas
- **Procurement Officer Email**: [emily.meas@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:emily.meas@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
- **Procurement Officer Contact Number**: 343-548-4195

#### Additional Information

- **Request for Proposal**: Requests for Proposal must be submitted electronically through the Supplier Portal.
- **Documents**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- **Enquiries**: All enquiries related to this solicitation must be addressed in writing to the Procurement Officer.

#### Attachments

- **Bid Documents**: Available for download at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca)
